longDesc: A deer looks at you with fear in its eyes.
detailedDesc: That is one nice looking deer! That is one nice looking deer!

longDesc: A small rabbit nibbles at a leaf here.
detailedDesc: It is a small, furry rodent with big ears. It is a small, furry rodent with big ears.

longDesc: A squirrel spots you and runs around a tree!
detailedDesc: It is a small, brown squirrel.  Kind of like a It is a small, brown squirrel.  Kind of like a fuzzy high-tension spring.

longDesc: An orc hunter looks at you with hateful eyes.
detailedDesc: He looks angry, desperate, and maybe a little sick. He looks angry, desperate, and maybe a little sick. His green skin is definitely mottled, and he seems to limp a little bit...

longDesc: An orc chief growls at you!
detailedDesc: He wears a crown of oak leaves to show he is a leader.  He He wears a crown of oak leaves to show he is a leader.  He carries a club to show he is a warrior.  You wonder how good he is at both.

longDesc: An orc woman stands here, frightened of you.
detailedDesc: As you stare her down, she raises her hands slowly, as if to As you stare her down, she raises her hands slowly, as if to say, 'Don't kill me'.

longDesc: An orc child frantically searches for her mother.
detailedDesc: She is raggedy, and seems to be covered with sores. She is raggedy, and seems to be covered with sores.

longDesc: A pregnant orc woman tries to stand to flee from you.
detailedDesc: She is too far gone to move very quickly.  You could She is too far gone to move very quickly.  You could kill her easily.

longDesc: A mutant orc lies here, barely alive.
detailedDesc: Its body has been twisted beyond all hope.  It is dying, and Its body has been twisted beyond all hope.  It is dying, and nothing will stop that.

longDesc: A horribly mutated orc stands here, gibbering.
detailedDesc: It doesn't even appear to have registered your arrival... it is It doesn't even appear to have registered your arrival... it is just talking to itself.  Its body is a twisted wreck of orc, man, beast, and what-not.

longDesc: An elven wizard is here.  He looks angry.
detailedDesc: He looks at you archly as he wonders why you have He looks at you archly as he wonders why you have invaded his domain.  No matter... it shouldn't be too hard for him to destroy you, no?

longDesc: An elven child casts his fishing pole into the river.
detailedDesc: He looks young and innocent.  You wonder what he is doing here. He looks young and innocent.  You wonder what he is doing here.

longDesc: A mutant... thing rushes at you!
detailedDesc: It might've been an orc, once.  Now it is a living terror, It might've been an orc, once.  Now it is a living terror, pushing everything out of its way to get at you.

longDesc: A mutant... thing tries to get you, but cannot move into range!
detailedDesc: It might have been an orc, once.  Now it is a living terror, It might have been an orc, once.  Now it is a living terror, pushing everything out of its way to get at you.
